data.name: Nyaa DeeperDark
data.description: Brining DeepDark and more themes to Nyaa.si This is just the base version of DeepDark. Stylish doesn't allow some code for Stylus which is needed for this style. You can find the full version of DeeperDark on GitHub (Requires Stylus)

data.name: Dark Voltron
data.description: A simple and crude adaptation of this style https://userstyles.org/styles/133958/darker-cherubplay with the voltron modifications of the old cherubplay event. Perfect for if you want some color with some black.
